column4: Hi, I have an old laptop (650 mhz p3) I'm trying to resurrect - it has an extremely flaky cdrom that i'm booting an old knoppix disk with.  there's nothing of any use on the HD - is there a howto from here to a functional install?
first link has a number of methods
If you can install GRUB, then "FromLinux" will work just fine.
Have you tried just booting to Ubuntu?  You can boot to Knoppix...
